attributes.action: Give Back Law Abiding Citizens Their Rights And Remove The Rights Of Criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Criminals have far too many rights once convicted, why should they be pandered to with stories being passed around of trying to make them as comfortable as possible in prison?

They have broken the law and as such do not deserve the same rights as law abiding citizens once convicted.  Why should they be allowed to sue people from jail?  Order magazines while in prison?  Be allowed in "Open prisons" or day release?  Be allowed to continually re-offend?

Give us back our rights and stop pandering to the criminals!
